body_html: Indeed, and we plan to do that very soon. Due to time constraints, we've initially moved it inside TF core, and from there we'll extract the reusable parts into a standalone repo. We hope to have that set up by the end of this year.
body_text: Indeed, and we plan to do that very soon. Due to time constraints, we've initially moved it inside TF core, and from there we'll extract the reusable parts into a standalone repo. We hope to have that set up by the end of this year.
body: Indeed, and we plan to do that very soon. Due to time constraints, we've initially moved it inside TF core, and from there we'll extract the reusable parts into a standalone repo. We hope to have that set up by the end of this year.
